club.name: Kelana Jaya Run Club (KJRC)
club.tagline: We're more than just runners - we're a movement
vision: Create an inclusive, welcoming space where runners of all levels grow, connect, and thrive.
Be the go-to running club that empowers through the joy of running, community, and purposeful strides.
club.mission: Community, growth, knowledge, and heart at every step.

divisions.name: Speedwork DVSN
divisions.description: Weekly curated sessions to build speed, strength, and help runners reach their next PR. Beginners to intermediates welcome.

divisions.name: Trail DVSN
divisions.description: Beginner-friendly off-road runs guided by experienced trail runners. Fitness + adventure, muddy shoes, stronger legs.

divisions.name: Coaching DVSN
divisions.description: Workshops, weekly runs, HIIT, running technique, and strength training to move smarter and recover better.

divisions.name: City DVSN
divisions.description: Guided group city runs that blend fitness with friendship. Shared stories, laughs, and joy through KL & PJ.

divisions.name: LSD DVSN
divisions.description: Long Slow Distance runs to build endurance at conversational pace. Includes LSDT (looping runs).

divisions.name: Hiking DVSN
divisions.description: Chill-paced hikes for all ages. Connection, calm, and discovery of nature together.

divisions.name: Ultra DVSN
divisions.description: Beyond-marathon training: grit, discipline, brutal mileage, elevation, and mental toughness.

divisions.name: Media DVSN
divisions.description: Captures spirit of every session via photos, videos, and reels. Celebrates each runner's journey.

keyMessage: KJRC is more than a club - it's family. Every finish line is a celebration. All runners, all levels, one crew.
